descriptionHTML:
Budge Studios™ presents Thomas & Friends™ Minis! Create your very own train set piece by piece and bring it to life with Thomas and all his friends. Customize endlessly and let your imagination run free with whirly waterslides, frozen loops, rainbow bridges, dino spine rails and more! Climb aboard your favorite Minis engine and experience every twist, turn and stunt! Ready, set, build!

THE ULTIMATE TRAIN SET BUILDER
• IMMERSE yourself in your train set and experience it like never before with Augmented Reality!*
• BUILD tons of exciting tracks, from twisting turns to rattling ramps
• ROCKET yourself through spectacular stunts, bold boosts and raging rollercoasters!
• DECORATE your train set with tall trees, beautiful buildings and dazzling decorations
• PAINT your set’s terrain with sandy beaches, bubbling lava and snowy blizzards
• DRIVE through your creations in 3rd person with Thomas, Percy and more!
• COLLECT golden gears to unlock epic engine skins like Hero Hiro or Spooky Spencer!
• CREATE your world from scratch or play with one of our awesome pre-made sets!
*AR is compatible with Android 7.0 (Nougat) and above and available on certain devices only.

GET CREATIVE WITH 6 UNIQUE WORLDS TO DISCOVER
• THOMAS’ COUNTRYSIDE: Explore the windmills, train stations and workshops of verdant Sodor!
• GORDON’S WINTER WONDERLAND: Ride over frozen bridges and crash through ice walls!
• PERCY’S SPOOKY FOREST: Dare you enter the hollow log tunnel and haunted mansion?
• TOBY’S BUSY CITY: Visit the fire station, hospital and deliver the mail downtown!
SPENCER’S AQUA PARK: Dive through the whirlpool tunnel and slide down the waterslide loop!
• JAMES’ JURASSIC COVE: Venture to the lost land of treasure-filled cars and triceratops skull tunnels!

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), a privacy legislation in the United States of America. This application has received the “ESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids’ Privacy Seal”. If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/. If you have any questions, email our Privacy Officer at: privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this game, please note that this app is free to play, but additional content may be available via in-app purchases. It also may contain contextual advertising from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish and from partners, as well as social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate.  Budge Studios does not do any behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app.

Please note that this app gives users the ability to take and/or create photos in-app that can be saved locally to their devices. These photos are never shared with other users in-app, nor are they shared by Budge Studios with any unaffiliated third party companies.

TERMS OF USE / END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: http://www.budgestudios.com/en/legal/eula/

ABOUT BUDGE STUDIOS
Budge Studios leads the industry by providing entertaining apps for kids through innovation and creativity. The company develops and publishes apps for smartphones and tablets played by millions of children worldwide.

Visit us: www.budgestudios.com
Like us: facebook.com/budgestudios
Follow us: @budgestudios
Watch our app trailers: youtube.com/budgestudios

HAVE QUESTIONS?
We always welcome your questions, suggestions and comments. Contact us 24/7 at support@budgestudios.ca

BUDGE and BUDGE STUDIOS are trademarks of Budge Studios Inc.
Thomas & Friend™ Minis © 2017 Budge Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.

descriptionHTML:
FPS modern shooter is the most exciting and thrilling world war II shooting game. It’s time for army battle of elite shooter against the militant hunters. You have to fight like an American soldier & destroy enemy’s territory with powerful weapons. FPS sniper terrorist runs for their survival in a fantasy offline battle shooting war. So you are trained FPS modern super shooter though you can easily handle the tank heroic war. Find the city American soldier to stop the fire superstorm with the sniper for free weapons.

It’s an ultimate super battle between FPS sniper commando and world war II enemies. This is a survival of strongest hero in army battle war. Force of enemy’s war is ready to find your city & destroying a building with their powerful weapons. Elite FPS sniper is always here for your help as an action superhero commando in survival strategy game.

Don’t mess up with epic fantasy fight, just follow the rules of shooting survival and become a War hero. In this Fps modern shooter 3D game, no one is able to take you down. Just believe in yourself and never let any evil escape from this city as a militant smasher. This tactical war only needs a war hero in world war II. So it’s your duty to conquer the modern world in best hero game. Let’s begin the fire super storm adventure of FPS sniper.

Features

• 3D shooting Survival game.
• Experience the world war scenario with powerful weapons.
• Weapons searching consequence in a battle environment.
• Epic tactical movement with the strategic theme.

So I have no idea why I am always at a club disadvantage. My driver is level 5 and always vs a person with level 7 or 8. Why do I never go against level 3 drivers. Always vs higher clubs! ALL THE TIME! you might as well give them the win. Losing me as a customer because there is something very lopsided.

The mechanics of the game are fun, but once you move up a rank or two winning is tough. That is an issue because gold (needed to upgrade) is earned thru even payout bets and very little gold is generated naturally. If you can't keep a high win % you either can't play or need to spend $$$. It's hard to win often when most games come down to closest to the pin shootouts.

descriptionHTML:
Experience the thrill of the 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia™ with the new Panini Digital Sticker Album in partnership with Coca-Cola!

COLLECT, STICK, SWAP, COMPLETE!
Download the app and enjoy the hunt to capture the world’s biggest football teams and superstars in your very own digital album!
The Panini Digital Sticker Album includes all 32 teams competing in the 2018 FIFA World Cup™. There’s also additional content and special rewards to be completed during the World Cup.
Start collecting TODAY and be sure to complete your collection before 31 August!
To complete your album quicker, start a Collectors Group with your friends or join an existing group!

COLLECT THE BEST TEAMS AND PLAYERS
Hunt for the world’s biggest football stars; collect, swap and stick them all into your Panini Digital Sticker album with the official mobile app.

ENJOY ALL THE FUNCTIONS OF THE DESKTOP VERSION DIRECTLY ON YOUR SMART DEVICE
The app provides you with all the functions of the Panini Digital Sticker Album website (FIFA.com/paninistickeralbum) conveniently on your phone or tablet:
- Manage your digital album
- Collect more digital sticker packets
- Glue in your digital stickers
- Swap your digital stickers with other collectors
- Create your group of collectors with your friends
- Compete in unique challenges
- Earn badges and complete the digital album
- Update set of stickers in June 2018

UNLOCK EXTRA STICKER PACKETS WITH COCA-COLA PRODUCTS*
Look for Coca-Cola products and scan them to earn additional sticker packets!

*Coca-Cola label stickers available in Austria, Mexico and Switzerland on select bottles.

FIND CODES TO EARN MORE STICKERS
Whether it’s at the back of your physical Panini 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia™ stickers or on social media, hunt down the codes that will help you earn more digital sticker packs and complete your Panini Digital Sticker Album quicker!

description: Play the best and most addicting bubble shooter game out there - Blaze Bubbles! Fire up and explode bubbles to overcome challenges. Join the journey and enjoy thousands of hot and exciting levels. This cool game is entirely free to download! What are you waiting for? Join the adventure today and blaze up the battle! Match, hit, and blast bubbles to reach the level target and win levels. There are thousands of incredible levels to explore, so you better get going. Win levels by shooting and popping all the bubbles until you clear the board. Play now and explore all the awesome surprises and joys this game has to offer!The amazing Blaze Bubbles shooter game features lots of hot puzzle levels, highly addictive gameplay and cool exploding graphics and effects. Join the battle, and fire up your fingers to explode and blast bubbles! This exciting adventure is free for both kids and adults to play and enjoy.How to Play- Match and burst at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the combo. - Take a shot, and pop and explode groups of bubbles to win points. - Try to beat thousands of challenging levels filled with bubbles and puzzles. - Swapping bubbles is completely free, just tap on the bubble to change its color. - Complete levels and advance along the bubble map. Solve the bubble packed puzzles and earn awesome boosts and power-ups: * Hit and pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball shot that will burn every bubble on the way and cut through a pass.* Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb shot that will take out the surrounding bubbles and clear the way. PLAY AND ENJOY BLAZE BUBBLES!- Plenty of unique levels packed with awesome challenges.- Fun puzzles and brain teasers to keep you engaged for hours!- Use awesome power-ups to complete missions and win levels.- Captivating gameplay experience with plenty of blazing flames and cannons.- Completely FREE to play.This hot shooter game totally free, and 100% addicting! Join the bubble blasting fun - It‚Äôs the perfect pastime game to play when you want to relax and clear your mind! Fire up the cannon and start blazing the bubbles in your exploding journey. Do not stop until every single one is cleared, and you see flames! Start the bubble battle today!

PLAY AND ENJOY BLAZE BUBBLES!

This hot shooter game totally free, and 100% addicting!

Start the bubble battle today!

comments: Nice new game series.  Has potential.  Customizable difficulty settings, perfectly lit ,colorful graphics, teleporting map, hidden (morphing) birds and chess pieces. Has an icon that lights up (dimly) as you find them for that location.   Unfortunately I didn't find them all because:                            1.) I had hard time seeing chess pieces         2.) Didn't even know there were birds (crow) and morphing on top of that until well into the game.   There was NO strategy guide and rather disappointed that there was NO bonus game play. If going to charge full price,  then must provide a fully loaded game!Looking forward to the next game in this series hopefully with these things addressed.

comments: Great addictive game! Starts out cute and innocent. Recently found out through a spoiler thread that it does take a darker turn in Ch 15. The U.S. servers are currently only on Ch 12. Still a great addicting game that many players start out thinking "Awesome! A great game that I don't I can have the option to play for free!" Soon they cave when that ONE outfit comes along that they HAVE TO HAVE lol.

I love this game.I really do.It has brought me alot of joy. It's great fun and it's a guilty pleasure of mine. With that being said. Your Ranked Events are Not Excusable. I'm v7 so I have skin in the game as they say.. I will pass and when you stop your Ranked Events I will gladly change my review. No Excuse for a blantent cash grab you make a lot of money.

I love this game! It's really good for creative people who like to design their own outfits. I just downloaded on my new phone and started over (I don't have Facebook to link my progress with). Please make it available to link with Google play so I don't always lose progress!   Also, since downloading again, I found that some of the names are different... I was very confused, since the voice over still says the old names. I like Yoko way better than Bobo!!

I loved this game, and am V8. So its not like I am against paying. I am against the ranking event especially since you devs LIED TO YOUR PLAYERS and said we wont be getting one again. We will not pay 100s for a non guarenteed reward. It would be more HONEST, if you set up the suits as 300 USD each recharge.  If you are smart at all, devs you should understand that business ethics is just as important as profit and will benefit everyone in the long run.

Lovely game! Gorgeous clothes and gameplay. A little cheesy in. The story but fairly creative for a dress up game. Plus it can be hilarious with how wild the lore gets around fashion. Design can be a little overcrowded sometimes but everything is coordinated so it still looks nice. Backgrounds are gorgeously painted. Tutorial is easy to understand but isnt too tedious. I am officially addicted

I never write reviews, but this game deserves all the praise possible. Downloaded it for my niece and turns out I am the one addicted!! I'm a daily player now and love the fact that you can start your own group for 300 gems and approve applications and interact with your stylist association members. That aspect took the game to a whole new level. The clothing is beautiful and the attention to detail is great!!! Give it a shot and you just may become addicted like myself. I do spend around 20 bucks a week, but it was just as much fun before I was spending money, I just wanted the special clothes for events.
description: ACHIEVEMENTS1. Recommended by Google Play in many countries    2. More than 50 million players world-wideALSO FEATURES  Designed focusing on dressing up, with high image quality and interesting game-play.  Bringing stereoscopic gaming experience to you.                Interesting story-lineThe protagonist Nikki will embark on a magical journey across seven nations with different designing styles, and develop various stories with designers and stylists from these seven countries. With nearly 300,000 words'dialogues and descriptions, the plot is comparable to that of a novel!                                          Tens of thousands gorgeous outfitsDaily fashion, European style, antique beauty, dream-like fairy tales, neutral handsome, futuristic sci-fi‚Ä¶Almost all dressing styles are covered. Players can collect new outfits and enrich their own closets by completing in-game tasks every day. Supported by a fantastic artists' team, we consistently add new outfits on a monthly basis, making sure that the game keeps up with new trends.                                                                             Hundreds of different styles for free designIn our free design mode, players can freely style and design outfits, hairstyles, makeup, accessories and even change the backgrounds and layouts based on their own preferences.   Personally tailoredBy collecting different colored dyes, players can freely change the color of their clothing.                                                                            By collecting outfits patterns and decomposing redundant outfits, players can personally customize clothes and upgrade simple clothing into more elegant and fashionable outfits.Designer dress up battlePlayers can compete and battle against designers from all over the world under different dress up themes.                                   More than ten different 'abilities' can be used in dress up battles. Use your 'abilities' at the right moment to turn the tide!                                                            Playing with your friendsPlayers can play the game with their Facebook friends.                                                                            You can also make new friends by joining in various in-game activities. Facebook Fan-pageFollow us - Love Nikki - on Facebook and you can regularly receive free game benefits. There're also many interesting online and offline activities on a daily basis waiting for your participation.Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LoveNikkiGameOur Service mailbox: cs1nikkigame@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
ACHIEVEMENTS

1. Recommended by Google Play in many countries
2. More than 50 million players world-wide

ALSO FEATURES

Designed focusing on dressing up, with high image quality and interesting game-play. Bringing stereoscopic gaming experience to you.

Interesting story-line
The protagonist Nikki will embark on a magical journey across seven nations with different designing styles, and develop various stories with designers and stylists from these seven countries. With nearly 300,000 words'dialogues and descriptions, the plot is comparable to that of a novel!

Tens of thousands gorgeous outfits
Daily fashion, European style, antique beauty, dream-like fairy tales, neutral handsome, futuristic sci-fi…Almost all dressing styles are covered. Players can collect new outfits and enrich their own closets by completing in-game tasks every day. Supported by a fantastic artists' team, we consistently add new outfits on a monthly basis, making sure that the game keeps up with new trends.

Hundreds of different styles for free design
In our free design mode, players can freely style and design outfits, hairstyles, makeup, accessories and even change the backgrounds and layouts based on their own preferences.

Personally tailored
By collecting different colored dyes, players can freely change the color of their clothing. By collecting outfits patterns and decomposing redundant outfits, players can personally customize clothes and upgrade simple clothing into more elegant and fashionable outfits.

Designer dress up battle
Players can compete and battle against designers from all over the world under different dress up themes.
More than ten different 'abilities' can be used in dress up battles. Use your 'abilities' at the right moment to turn the tide!

Playing with your friends
Players can play the game with their Facebook friends. You can also make new friends by joining in various in-game activities.

Facebook Fan-page
Follow us - Love Nikki - on Facebook and you can regularly receive free game benefits. There're also many interesting online and offline activities on a daily basis waiting for your participation.

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LoveNikkiGame
Our Service mailbox: cs1nikkigame@gmail.com

descriptionHTML:
Online Cyber Robot Game!
Twin stick deathmatch Multiplayer - play friends or gamers all over the world.
Plot: Mankind is at war and under attack from aliens, robots and cyborgs!
Choose your armor and weapons, manage combat unit “Cyber-sphere” to defend the base from the advancing enemy across the planets. Use armoury such as guns, missiles, energy weapons, support drones, camouflage and explosions to destruct the enemy.
You can fight alone or join forces, killing on the battleground with other pilots in new online multiplayer mode!
Good luck, solder! Civilisation as we know it depends upon you.

Key Features:
★ Slick futuristic 3D graphics - making it feel like reality.
★ Single-player - you only have yourself to rely on to prevent the apocalypse.
★ Crossplatform multiplayer - up to 8 players with iOS and Android devices can play together.
★ Offline mode - you can play without internet connection.
★ PVE with friends - join forces and increase your firepower in virtual fightin!
★ PVP mode - find out, who is the best pilot!
★ Plenty of weapons - more than 32 deadly guns.
★ Many support drone models - The drone game you want to be a part of, so use your AI-controlled guardians.
★ Lot of character types - manage futuristic tanks, walking mechas, cyborgs and solders, each with unique special ability!
★ Easiness of control - you can manage it intuitively using on-screen controls or gamepad
★ Global ratings - become the Sci-fI best robot destroyer in the world!
★ A variety of enemies - fighting robots, aliens, cyborgs
★ Small size - under 50 mb!
★ Non-stop Sci Fi Top down cyborg shooter action - one of the most interesting action games of 2017, it will not let you relax even a single second!

Your new favourite in the shooting games industry, with twinstick control system, fighting to the deathmatch. The online Scifi game that will get you hooked!
Player, are you ready? Now, aboard the Spaceship!
recentChanges: - Increased power of Repair Tool and Flamethrower
summary: New SciFi Shooting Game with Online Deathmatch & Defence mode. Kill the robots!
title: CyberSphere: Online Action Game

comments: Played for a few minutes and ran out of storage space in the silo, making the game pointless. Yes, I realize you can free up space by selling items in the market, but then you don't have enough items to make things you need for orders. Pointless.

As of a week into it,  it is moving VERY slow with things to do.  Much like hay day,  still needs work.  If I don't get things to build barn and silo soon,  I have to uninstall,  because I do not put money into free games.

I enjoy the game and comical animals. I am always woefully short of coins and purchase is expensive. Fruit trees die after few harvests and limited options to revive. Ok if patient with not purchasing items after rapid level ups.
The game is great for kids to learn. But the game it self it's freezing up. You can play but parts of it will disappear and you can't see what you are doing.
Better than all the other farms out there thank you for this free app and you get farther than spending money to get far

comments: I almost can't believe this is real, but it is and it's wonderful. Whimsical, beautiful, and I'm so grateful. Thank you for cheering me up! It's without a doubt one of the most gorgeous games I've ever played! And the puzzles are just right, not too hard and not too simple. Did I mention how gorgeous it is?

Beautiful art and music: creates a great atmosphere. The puzzles are fun, some pretty easy, some requiring a bit of thought. Just wish there was more content. The only issue I have with the game is that the plants' shadows don't look like numbers to me, at all. Had to use hint there. Still don't see it.

The game is charming and heartwarming. The puzzles are fairly simple while some stages require thought. Each stage has a relaxing atmosphere with fitting, beautiful music. The lighting was gorgeous. The game is simple to understand. My only complaint is that I wish there was more! It only has 6 stages.

Its a really  great game I've been playing this game for a while trying to figure out how to get the puzzle figure out, for anyone who is trying to test how good you ar at solving problems I reallllyyy recommend this game ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§  üê∞Thank you for creating an awsome gameüêß
Cute art puzzle game. Some of them make you have to stop and think about how your looking at them to get them. It's a shame it's only 6 levels. The music is very relaxing.
It's so adorable! I love the artwork, the puzzles, EVERYTHING! It's such a fun game to kill some time and I hope there will be more puzzles soon.

descriptionHTML:
Let's escape from the door by exploring the world like a picture book.


■ Features ■
· It is an escape game that solves a mystery together with a cute character.
· Escape game It is a game that even beginners can enjoy.
· Go around various stages, use items or solve problems and escape.
· Clear room will become lively.
· All six stages. There are plenty of extras.
· Healing music. Turn on BGM and play around.
· Once you clear the stage you can play many times later.
· You can play all free.


■ It is recommended for ■
· I love healing games.
· I like escape games.
· I like kawaii games.
· I love cute characters and animals.
· I want to play freely and free of charge.
· I want to collect items.


■ How to play
· It is a simple operation with only tap.
· Let's tap where I was interested.
· Press and hold the item in the item box to enlarge it.
· When the number of items increases, swipe the item box left or right to select it.
· Tap the gear icon on the screen to open the menu.
· You can see hints and answers from the menu. (* Required video viewing)


■ Note ■
Depending on the model, there may be times when it seems to stop on the white screen at the beginning of the stage.
There is a possibility that it takes time to load, so it may start when you wait for a while.

description: Quiz + Poker = ? Right, thrill paired with brainpower and fun! Fans of poker as well as fans of quizzes will acquire a taste for QuizPoker. Take a seat on a poker table with your friends or other players, put on your poker face and get started. There will be 15 questions out of 22 different categories waiting for you - from "Food" to "Logical Thinking" to "Stars". After each round, you can place your bet with play money, just as in a real poker game. Is there really a smart aleck sitting opposite you or is everything just a bluff? Will you raise your bet and make your opponents sweat or will you pass? All-in or all-out: the choice is yours! You can test your knowledge or your poker face with up to 3 opponents on your table at the same time - thus the thrill will increase.___________________APP RELEASE CONTEST:Who will own most play money and thus will be among the first 10 places in the highscore until May 31, 2018?There will be great prizes for you:1st place: 50‚Ç¨ Amazon coupon2nd-5th place: 500.000 Dollars play money6th-10th place: 20 x 2 jokers The contest will last from the release date of the app until May 31, 2018, 11:59 p.m. The participation is for free. Entitled to participate are all natural persons fourteen years of age and over, except people who are involved in the conception and realization of the app QuizPoker and their family members.The determination of the winners will take place after the mentioned period of time. The winners will be informed about the prize via e-mail soon after the expiration. Precondition is that the e-mail-adress is indicated correctly. The prize will be given only to the winner him-/herself. It is not possible to exchange the prize or to pay it in cash. In case the winner doesn't get in touch within three weeks after two requests, the prize can be transferred to another participant. In case the contest period will be extended, the organizer will give due notice. All the personal data compiled for the contest serve for matters of winning notification only and will not be shared with third parties. Questions or complaints concerning the contest are to be brought to notice to the organizer. Any recourse to courts of law is excluded. You can find possibilities to get in touch in the legal notice of the app or the website.The QuizPoker team wishes you lots of luck and fun!

comments: Sorry to say, but in terms of balance it is the worst game I have played so far. This game is the most unbalanced game, even for beginners. Currently I have 4 heroes and the funny part is that all four are weak against defense, such as a cannon, a rail gun, 2 stars for the full upgrade. Even high level players can attack on beginners. Defence is too much high for the attacking players, against 2 heros unit and I've noticed that lower level players can not overcome my defence while high-level players pass easily. This game is good and entertaining, there is not much flaw in this game, but this game is very unbalanced and unfair. Many players have complained about this.
Insane build times make it pretty pointless to play. Log on once a day, start another 3 day build.... boring.

I am surprised how underrated and less known this game is. It's am such a beautiful and well made game that it's breathtaking to just look at. Awesome animation and graphics. I hope it hooks me more as I continue playing.

descriptionHTML:
Hold onto your helmets - the award-winning Fieldrunners series returns! From exploding Popcorn Chicken to the mighty Megabot, it’s time to assemble the ultimate army as you fight to build your empire, and conquer rival players from around the world!

Recruit heroes, train troops, add defensive structures and manage resources to transform a quaint town into your own impenetrable fortress of mayhem. Whether you’re defending your turf, conquering the land in the campaign missions, or ripping through opponents worldwide in multiplayer skirmishes, there’s loot and glory to be had at every turn.

FEATURES:
• Addicting full control strategic combat gameplay
• Take charge and attack in the Fieldrunners universe!
• Manage resources to turn your town into an impenetrable fortress!
• Recruit and upgrade powerful heroes, each with their own unique abilities!
• Tear through enemy bases with tactical real-time attacks
• Test your might against 60+ campaign missions!
• Climb the ranks with your friends by waging war on players around the world and stealing loot
• Field an army of Soldiers, Rocketeers, Tanks and more military marvels!
• Defend your turf with deadly Gatling, Cannon and Flame towers – as well as other Fieldrunners favorites and all-new defensive turrets
• Transform your towers to adapt against a variety of threats, be they man, machine, or something else entirely!

Not very good I'm not happy, I will try again before uninstalling this game if I manage to get in the game, obviously the review will change get but until then it's 1 star ass I can not go any lower. Sorry game makers!

I wonder if there will be transcended busters in the future. Or perhaps the current arch buster will be the 'warrior' type and there will 1 of each type for us to mount. Looking forward to the overlord release though!

Love the game been playing for over 2 1/2 years. Only one probably lately and that is my WB scores have been down substantially along with other users. I dont understand how going from a few archs' to having 6 and new gear makes my score down 14 trillion? Im bot the only one this is happening to so im a bit confused on what the problem is. Other than that great game play it everyday. Just dont like losing rewards on my wb% when it should be higher.

After massive update and huge changes, I have to change my rating from 2 to 5.Such a big improvement toward all player,either f2p or whales.Congrats Gamevil, hopefully the community will grow as we see now in this game itself.

comments: Hasn't even been 10 seconds into the game before it shut down ü§£ - I thought it would be different for me as I have the S8+. Obviously NOT. The game started off very well and easy to navigate. Ease of controls. I will uninstall as there isn't much point keeping this game when it has already failed itself.

Let's be honest here. The concept was very creative and unique, but the game was very poorly designed. The slide is not smooth and   feels very unstable, I wasn't able to enjoy playing the game. The graphics are very low and the game itself is slow. Apart from that the idea was very well thought of but I feel you should have added more time and professionalism into the whole design, the game has potential.

One thing I find annoying is the adds! The game itself is addicting, but every time you die you have to sit through these long adds. I guess you could pay for the game without adds, but if your like me and you don't really like spending money at the app store, patience my friend... the game is worth it...

It is shuting down again and again, in starting that  heppen after 2-3 min then under 1 min and now I open and it shut down in few seconds. For my Moto x play runing 7.1.1  Love concept and game environment.  Control is fine.  Graphic are good.

It's hard to control and there are WAY too many ads. It lags so I'll be doing fine but it'll make me crash because it paused for a brief moment. If all this was improved, I'd love it. I love the concept of the game but everything else sucks.

People... There are little mistakes that every game has. There is sucky parts of this game such as ads between every time that you die but the concept of the game is to not die so I kinda guess it gives you a goal. This is an awesome game but it won't work for every device. There are some BAD comments that may discourage you but trust me my friends... Try it.. It doesn't work, there is always the uninstall button for you.

comments: TOO MANY ADS. Saw an ad that said only 1% get past level nine. So I tried it. It would play a 30 second ad every 2 attempts. Each attempt only takes about 15 seconds so about 50% of your time is spent watching ads. Beat level 15 in less than 20 minutes so clearly they were false advertising or they included the people that uninstalled the game cuz of it's ads spam and pathetic gameplay.
never in my life have i seen so many adds on a game. don't waste your life or your data. you cannot skip the adds and they are at least 30 seconds long.... absolute rubbish waste of time
It's a fun game killed by excessive amount of ads. Like 30 seconds every two or so levels and every time you lose it's way too much. They'd be a five star game without that ridiculous amount of ads.
Fun but WAY too many Ads. 30s + after every other game. Changed to another game also called scale but not containing ads.  If they would reduce the number of ads it would be a great game
Way too many ads. Don't quite understand why anyone would think that's the right balance coz I'm like.. I'm not playing this anymore just coz of the ridiculous amount of ads.
Superb! Way too many adverts - but worth the small price to go advert free. If, like me, you loved Qix back in the day you'll love this!

description: What an amazing story and stunning features are provided by this horse game. It has a defined purpose that will motivate you to move further and accomplish all the required tasks in order to recover our princess sight back from the evil witch that stole it. This sad story must have a happy ending and you will be the one that will provide it. Her beloved stallion is actually the one that will go through all those difficult paths so if you want to handle this situation you have to empower her. Destiny, or as we like to call her, the bravest horse, is going to have an intense adventure and she needs to be ready for any trouble that might overcome. You have 5 items that will show you her condition and each one presents her state like sleeping, eating, being loved, using the toilet or the health of her hooves. All of them needs to be almost fulfilled so you could proceed with achieving the levels. The happiness could be gained by brushing or by playing those funny mini-games. This is one method to get money, but also to earn diamonds and money you could collect them from your trip and this is what exactly you are going to do when your horse's needs are complete. Go through each level to unlock the following one and try to find all those three crowns so you could finish your job. During the race, you have to take as many coins as you can because it will help you buy important things for Destiny, such as food. The game has instructions and every new move is going to be explained and you will see how easy is to learn the way it works. More than that your stallion is going to be rated for her performance during the race of each level, so do your best and earn the best star points. You've got to make it through all 100 levels that are in different lands and has particular challenges. Also, you will notice that we provided an interesting rage of horses from where to choose once you go deeper into the game. You could even customize your horse hair and all, but to make it more interesting we've given you the chance to arrange the stable as well. These and much more is about to welcome you in this complex game.

comments: Fun Game! Something like Starcraft and something like Clash of Clans, but it stands as its own thing entirely. Why aren't more people playing this!? I've had much fun playing and it looks like the game is thoroughly enjoyable. Thank you for making this game. :)
So I'm guessing copyright laws don't apply in China.  Such a blatant rip off of Blizzard's Starcraft. And Starcraft is much, much better.

The game has strong Starcraft themes and is an interesting look at how you can execute a system for the phone instead of computer with a mouse. I do not like the amount of shop or cash purchase options they keep throwing in my face including making buying something with real money one of the quest missions.  The graphics are nice and it seems to have a interesting story otherwise, so it's at least worth looking at. If they reduce the amount of pay to win being thrown right up front I would be willing to raise this to four stars

The game is rigged. You won't be able to rank up until you invest more money to win. It's a pay to win game. Not worth the time and money. Mobile games in general suck. Just save up for a console game. Microtransactions ate rip offs.
Really regret paying for Monthly VIP, not worth playing this game
Not being able to pick species straight away is making it Meh for me.

description: Grand Battle Royale Season 2018! If you like military blocky pixel games and battle royale games then you will definitely like Grand Battle Royale! Survive the battlegrounds, improve your shooting skills, and develop new PVP tactics for FREE!Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. Players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Survive by collecting more guns so you have an advantage over other players.‚Ä¢ Just like in true 3D block survival games, you can purchase any pixel block strike skins.‚Ä¢ Grab a pixel gun and dive into battle: Fun pixel graphics great for intense shooting battles!‚Ä¢ Big radiation island this is the place where you have to survive while you playing in the blocky city. ‚Ä¢ Multiplayer game is absolutely free online game for download. description: It's the right time for new exciting and fun adventures! And what awaits us today is not just a walk in the park, but a real farm for children, which we will have to visit and work a little. After all, it's time to harvest.Our merry farm and all its inhabitants are looking forward to you and your kids. We present you a new exciting game from the series developing games for children - "Kids Farm".This game is a fun and addictive farm simulator. Here in the management of your baby there will be a real farm on which it will be necessary to plant vegetables, water and fertilize them, fight pests in order to subsequently harvest a good harvest. You will also need to take care of pets and a large apiary. Your kid, as a real farmer, will have to deal with all these fascinating and interesting things. Will he be able to cope with such a large farm? We will just check it!Game cheerful farm is a unique educational and developing game that will interest not only boys, but also girls. It will clearly show and help children learn: how the farm is conducted, how it is arranged, what animals are there and how to take care of them. He learns how to plant trees and other plants, take care of them, fight various agricultural pests and much more. Carrying out various interesting tasks and selling the crop to your child, with the money earned in the game, will be able to develop and decorate it, supplementing new and interesting elements in the game.        A baby farm is an exciting game that your child can play for hours on the fly, and who can entertain him when bored, and your baby will certainly want to play it again and again. Playing it, your baby will create his own, small cozy world, in which he does not have to miss a single minute, will show the crumbs all the charm and beauty of a real farm, and at the same time - without leaving home.        Do not be bored on such a wonderful day! Our farm for babies is waiting for you! To start playing the farm game you need to download it to your tablet or phone. comments: Do not download this expecting it to be the game and gameplay featured in the sponsored Facebook advertising campaign. That is clearly lifted from another game, the gameplay of which didn't even represent how this game is played as in the scenes in the advert. Highly misleading and very disappointing. The actual game itself is an average mobile battle game featuring local maps like Pokemon Go or Snatch.

I cant use the letter "L" when making a name. Idk what else is flagged cuz the game wont even tell me what requirements and restrictions apply for the name creation. I havent even started the game and im already disappointed...please fix or tell me what im doing wrong
If you had a recharge issue, just contact them on their Facebook page and they'll resolve your issue pretty quickly. Bought some Gems but didn't get them automatically. Thanks for the help!
Make sure to join the Discord server and you can chat with the GMs directly. You'll also hear about upcoming content and events before they're announced to the public

Played for an hour. Was forced logged out. All my progress vanished in an istant. This is exactly why i wont spend a dime on mobil games. Too untrustworthy and too prone to glitching. What a waste of time and a total rip off of pokemon go.

Good graphics. Unfortunately, I don't like constant attempts to get me to spend money. The game itself was laggy. The tutorials were excessively annoying and intrusive. I.e. You level up, which unlocks a new feature, which triggers a tutorial, which forces you to stop what you were doing and do this. Right now. Can't do anything else until you do this tutorial. My last login. I immediately had a tutorial telling me to add my healer to the squad. Which was already added. So, the tutorial forced me to remove her. Meaning after that I had to go back and add her back in. Laggy, annoying, intrusive and begging for money. At least the graphics were good.
description: An AR-featured 3D fantasy RPG featuring a unique battle system and mysterious adventures. Become a Dimension Summoner and rewrite history!The lands are shivering from the grasps of evil and a great danger hides deep from within. You are the last true warrior who can unveil the truth and summon heroes across the dimensions. Be the beacon of light and bring hope back to the lands.You are the only hope. As the Dimension Summoner, you serve the king and will bring honor to the people. You will see through the chaos and summon the incarnations of heroes from different dimensions to fight by your side.AR SUMMONING WITH LBSThe forces of evil are so powerful that only the spirits of noble heroes from other dimensions can defeat them. You will train yourself to find the spirits of these heroes and summon them from your surroundings. Using your location, you will find the best places to attract heroes‚Äô souls. Through the eye of the dimensions, you can draw the symbol ‚ÄòS‚Äô or scan surrounding areas to appeal the spirits and then summon heroes of different tiers.ADJUST FORMATIONSHeroes will join you, equipped with legendary skills they once possessed in their own dimensions. In addition to these skills, you will also have the ability to adjust various battle formations by switching their position. In doing so, you will be able to eye the enemy and strategize accordingly.FAMILY OF HEROESThe heroes from the various dimensions have answered your call and have teamed up to fight together. They will morph into a new family of heroes with a united bond. Summon these bonded heroes to activate special bonds and even provide bonuses when off the battlefield. Start summoning now and save the land together!REFRESHING SCENERYIt is always important to take a break between fights. Relieve your heroes from fatigue and show them your captivating land. The picturesque landscapes and vivid creatures will be the optimal cure for your battle wounds. Never will you let the refreshing scenery here be ruined by the forces of evil!Now ready your weapons and prepare yourself for battle Dimension Summoner: Hero Arena!Receive the latest game news and claim a special prize over on our Facebook page:https://facebook.com/popdimensionsummonerFind friends, provide feedback and exchange guides in our Discord: https://discord.gg/Yu5ZqHP
descriptionHTML:
An AR-featured 3D fantasy RPG featuring a unique battle system and mysterious adventures. Become a Dimension Summoner and rewrite history!
The lands are shivering from the grasps of evil and a great danger hides deep from within. You are the last true warrior who can unveil the truth and summon heroes across the dimensions. Be the beacon of light and bring hope back to the lands.
You are the only hope. As the Dimension Summoner, you serve the king and will bring honor to the people. You will see through the chaos and summon the incarnations of heroes from different dimensions to fight by your side.

AR SUMMONING WITH LBS
The forces of evil are so powerful that only the spirits of noble heroes from other dimensions can defeat them. You will train yourself to find the spirits of these heroes and summon them from your surroundings. Using your location, you will find the best places to attract heroes’ souls. Through the eye of the dimensions, you can draw the symbol ‘S’ or scan surrounding areas to appeal the spirits and then summon heroes of different tiers.

ADJUST FORMATIONS
Heroes will join you, equipped with legendary skills they once possessed in their own dimensions. In addition to these skills, you will also have the ability to adjust various battle formations by switching their position. In doing so, you will be able to eye the enemy and strategize accordingly.

FAMILY OF HEROES
The heroes from the various dimensions have answered your call and have teamed up to fight together. They will morph into a new family of heroes with a united bond. Summon these bonded heroes to activate special bonds and even provide bonuses when off the battlefield. Start summoning now and save the land together!

REFRESHING SCENERY
It is always important to take a break between fights. Relieve your heroes from fatigue and show them your captivating land. The picturesque landscapes and vivid creatures will be the optimal cure for your battle wounds. Never will you let the refreshing scenery here be ruined by the forces of evil!

Now ready your weapons and prepare yourself for battle Dimension Summoner: Hero Arena!

Receive the latest game news and claim a special prize over on our Facebook page:
https://facebook.com/popdimensionsummoner

Find friends, provide feedback and exchange guides in our Discord: https://discord.gg/Yu5ZqHP

summary: Only brave heroes can stand at the frontier against evil, win the war with force
title: Dimension Summoner: Hero Arena 3D Fantasy RPG

descriptionHTML:
"Denken lernen - Probleme lösen" ist ein großes österreichisches Projekt für Grund- und Sekundarschulen.
Nach dem Prinzip "Von Haptik zur Abstraktion" wird der Einstieg mit der Roboterbiene "Bee-Bot" als erster elementarer Schritt zum Coding in der Schule durchgeführt. Entlehnt aus der Programmiersprache LOGO werden ersten Befehlselemente angewendet.
Diese App "RoboBee" geht dann einen Schritt weiter - weg von der haptischen Ebene - in die Abstraktion und versucht mit zahlreichen Anwendungsbeispielen aus den Unterrichtsgegenständen der Schule den spielerischen Aspekt des Programmierens voranzutreiben.

comments: Its a great game to take some time out and calm down with concentration. But the highet levels require paid extras to pass the hard levels which is disappointing. Though some are cheap at 99p but most are expensive over 4.99. Not worth it for simple game like this. It is fun though.

The dots games are my favourite ever. After over 1000 levels of two dots, I discovered dots and co and love it just as much. It's challenging, but you can collect things to help along the way. I've played it every day for ages! Love it!!

Started by loving it, at level 200 I hate it.  It is designed to make you buy extras. Levels are extremely difficult to pass and you don't get enough item such as balloons or butterflies to allow you to go though to the next level.  Will give it a couple more weeks otherwise I'll delete it

The game is fun but can be frustrating. Companion points are hard to get,  and not knowing this leads people to use them in the beginning levels. There are no instructions or pointers,  so its a figure it out as you go. Thus the frustration. Still a fun game.
I refuse to pay for in app purchases so it takes longer to complete each level as I have to wait for my 'lives' to refill. Other than that it is a bit of fun to pass the time.
Fun game. Challenging on some parts. Only thing I dont like is how much gold it has you use if you want to keep playing a level to win. Overall a really fun game

descriptionHTML:
Explore beautiful landscapes and embark on a visual journey by solving puzzles with magical companions that help you along the way.

Are you ready, adventurer? Let’s go!

WHY YOU’LL LOVE DOTS & CO

• FREE to play!
• CHALLENGE yourself with 320 NEW and completely original levels, fun for Dots loyalists and new players alike
• ENJOY simple, thoughtful gameplay where you connect one Dot to another and play at your pace
• MEET various original Companion characters that help you beat levels
• SOLVE clever puzzles containing over 15 visual mechanics using your wits to figure out the perfect move
• TRAVEL through beautiful landscapes and get lost in the world of Dots & Co
• PLAY beautifully

If you loved Two Dots, you’ll love Dots & Co: where new companions and their distinct powers bring a whole new layer of magic to the game you know and love.

*Color blind mode is available*
We remain committed to making sure all players can enjoy our games. You can turn on Color Blind Mode in the settings menu!

PLAY GAMES SERVICES
Dots & Co uses Play Games Services in order to save your progress within the game. While the game can be played offline, please make sure you are connected to Play Games Services and are online in order to properly save your progress with our servers.

SUPPORT
Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at:
dac-help@weplaydots.com.

PLEASE NOTE: Dots & Co is completely free to play, but you can also purchase some items within the game for real money. Just disable in app purchases on your device if you don't want to use this feature.

Use of Dots & Co is governed by the Dots terms of service:
http://weplaydots.com/sections.php?section=terms

description: There is a huge airport in the Hippo town. A lot of passengers use its services every day. Airport must have a lot of workers and managers to satisfy the passengers' needs. Airport is the place where people of different professions are working together. There are stewardess and pilot, cashier and security officer. And the shop assistant of duty free shop invites everybody to visit the shop. Today we are going to learn about the professions which serve the airport in the Hippo town. The most skillful crew invites you to our plane. Let's go! Unbelievable adventures are waiting for us!We have prepared a real family surprise for boys and girls. We are going to some interesting place, where we'll get to know a lot of interesting and useful information. It is a real sky harbor, which could help you to get to any country, city or any place on our planet. It is not just an ordinary visit to a huge airport, we will also get to know about the professions, which could be met here. Do you want to know how a real stewardess works or how a pilot prepares a plane for take-off? Or maybe you want, like a real manager, launch your own duty free shop? You could check whether you are a good seller by playing our game behind the counter of the shop! Then you could look after the job of cashier, serving international flights. Together with Hippo you could visit luggage space and get to know the peculiarities of security officer job. But that's not all! We are going to learn how interesting is the job in passport check-point and try the job of stewardess! We are going to try a lot of interesting tasks today. It is easy and interesting to learn professions! Hippo crew is ready to pass a preflight check and go to the far away countries. Take part in all unbelievable adventures together with us!This new game, as well as all our family games for boys and girls, is absolutely for free. We have prepared a lot of interesting and useful games about important and exciting professions. Have fun and play our games together. Learn professions together with our beloved Hippo!

comments: Generally i like the game and its premise.  You take a day and something happend. You can have gotten hurt, found caps, found food, whatever. Then you will work your way up getting better gear and so forth. BUT the game is generous with ads. Too many advertisements for the little gameplay there is. The translation is spotty but works good enough for me.

Falls short. Your not getting enough caps like you should and your losing health at times I personally think you shouldn't, this goes with where you don't run into anything and you just lose health is a bit too aggressive with it.

I think it's a really great mobile game but the lack of English phrasing makes it hard to understand sometimes. Also, it can be hard to progress with some items being really expensive. Still though, a great game!
It could do with a bit of improvement. I like the features that are present. I think people are being a bit harsh about it. Still it's a good job!
Haters gatta hate but i love the game gives me that feeling that u have to play fallout nv or 3 or 4. Keep it up
its a good way spend time while your somewhere waiting to get home ...to play the the real fallout :) over all its really good keep it up!

description: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. descriptionHTML:
Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.

One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.

foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.

In lvl 15 you have to jump across the 3 wall without making an inch mistake but the walls movement are random, the movement of the walls determine whether we pass it or not, it does not take time and precision to aim across it, the random movement of tge wall determines the outcome which is random so you have to keep playing the level time after time to find the right movement. This is total BS.
description: In Ninja Tobu, speed and accuracy are key, as you guide your ninja through computer generated platforms, enemies, and spikes!Tap and drag from anywhere on the screen to power your ninja jump, then let go to shoot through the air. Aim for any surface not covered in spikes and you'll stick to it like glue; ready to go again.Then once you've got the hang of that, try mastering the double jump, or slamming into some enemies for extra points.Send him flying high enough, and maybe you'll unlock an achievement, or even make it on to the leader board!
descriptionHTML:
In Ninja Tobu, speed and accuracy are key, as you guide your ninja through computer generated platforms, enemies, and spikes!

Tap and drag from anywhere on the screen to power your ninja jump, then let go to shoot through the air. Aim for any surface not covered in spikes and you'll stick to it like glue; ready to go again.

Then once you've got the hang of that, try mastering the double jump, or slamming into some enemies for extra points.

Send him flying high enough, and maybe you'll unlock an achievement, or even make it on to the leader board!

descriptionHTML:
Build your deck, collect epic cards and Crush your enemies!
Easy to play but deep in strategy options. Try to collect all cards, build your best deck and begin your epic quest. Start with poor pikeman or poison sandworm and become owner of chaos zealot. Defeat epic bosses and loot treasures in campaign and PvP Arena. Come regulary co complete daily quests to get extra rewards.

Upgrade and forge better cards and imbue them with tokens. Evolved units have special abilities that can help you – heal your team, increase damage or armor. Amazing ccg deck building game with multiplayer PvP arena.

FEATURES
★ Collectible card game with more than 100 unique heroes
★ Well balanced strategy campaign with great rewards
★ Online PvP arena with global crushers rankings
★ Upgrade and Forge cards or disenchant them
★ Daily login bonus and daily quests ccg
★ Beautiful original hand-painted art

COLLECT CARDS & TOKENS
Try to build optimal deck from common cards like poor pikeman or poison sandworm up to legendary gold chaos zealot. Cards and tokens are rewarded in PvP arena and in campaign. Deck building game where you need to imbue tokens wisely to improve your might. Upgrade your skills in this deck building game and change your strategy to crush your opponents. Evolve epic and rare cards to higher tiers. Enchant and disenchant your loot for magical dust useable for forge and imbue.

CAMPAIGN
Defeat poison sandworm and poor pikeman in single player campaign and get new legendary cards, powerful tokens and disenchant dust. Every campaign contains special reward chests.
PVP & TOURNAMENTS
Fight in PvP arena to get to the top position and unlock new heroes. Come every day to win daily tournaments to get free diamonds or chaos zealot cards.

ADVANCED GAME TIPS
★ Compete in PvP arena to unlock new crushers like chaos zealot
★ Forge and evolve basic poison sandworm into the epic and legendary ccg tier
★ Complete daily quests and visit arena regulary for extra gems and coins
★ Combine with taunt ability like poor pikeman with offensive chaos zealot in this deck building game
★ Disenchant poison sandworm and poor pikeman to get magic crushers dust

Created by NOXPLAY 2017/2018

www.NOXPLAY.com

The game is surprising addicting and offers plenty of content! The progression is decent so far and I really liked the idea of the endeless game modes with leaderboards that reward you! My only gripes about it so far are:  - doesn't support 18:9 aspect ratio - the rewards for the endless game modes could use a boost imo - Only offers one control scheme (there's a game called skyforce: reloaded that offers a manual control setting, essentially the player doesn't follow the finger and the whole screen becomes a joystick, this helps with the game's clarity)   Great casual game otherwise, would recommend giving it a shot üôÇ

To anyone thinking about purchasing the game I would say go for it as the price is low (When I bought it), the gameplay is fun and lots of customisation, the graphics could be touched a small bit on but that's me being picky also I would suggest them having faster moving speed for the supermonkey and it feels a small bit slow.  The game is fun and my criticism with the graphics and the movement speed of the monkey should be either disregarded or taken with a grain of salt it does not ruin the gameplay in any way, shape or form.

comments: The upgrades are too expensive, with no other source of income than just selling fishes that takes forever to grow (if they even grow to adult), and watching ads. I tried to make it work for a day but it's super hard to earn money for upgrades. Even watching ads give so little rewards. Uninstalling. So unfortunate because i really loved the PC version of this.

I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

This app is good but need high battery consumption. I hope new upcoming update can reduce battery consumption. For everyone who complaint about money, just relax, breed your discovered expensive fish first and sell it till you have sufficient money. If you have much money you can discover more species freely in order to find magic fish. It's not about speed but it's about passion, strategy, trial error and patient.

descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work
recentChanges: Some optimizations and improvements for our Tycoons!
summary: Discover, breed and sell rare and exotic fish in this beautiful, realistic game!
title: Fish Tycoon 2 Virtual Aquarium

description: Farm SImulator : 2018 Modern Tractor Drive Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer. Complete every interesting mission of modern farmer games. Tractor drive. Be the best tractor parking driver. In the fields parking simulator of crazy tractor farming mania. User will be growing crops on his fields and to complete this process farmer needs a tractor. Become a village farmer and cultivate your crops. In this new farming tractor simulator free game you will drive a harvester, heavy drill machinery, After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. Take a good care of your large farm and use proper farming techniques to obtain a high yield. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. Take the best out of your agricultural career by cultivating your mud farm and take your agricultural career to the peaks. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. huge open world of your modern farmland and cultivate or harvest multiple types of crops such as sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, rice, cotton and sunflower. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. This off road tractor land cultivator extreme farming adventure will train you as a pro tractor driver and gives you great tips of agriculture and crops cultivation. The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. This is the perfect farming season so harvest your crops and grow new crops to sell them to market in a village for money and go through the complete process of growing crops. Tractor drive. Be the best tractor parking driver. In the fields parking simulator of crazy tractor farming mania. User will be growing crops on his fields and to complete this process farmer needs a tractor. Become a village farmer and cultivate your crops. In this new farming tractor simulator free game you will drive a harvester, heavy drill machinery, After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. Take the best out of your agricultural career by cultivating your mud farm and take your agricultural career to the peaks.

The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. huge open world of your modern farmland and cultivate or harvest multiple types of crops such as sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, rice, cotton and sunflower. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. This off road tractor land cultivator extreme farming adventure will train you as a pro tractor driver and gives you great tips of agriculture and crops cultivation. The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. comments: Let me say that this game is sooooo good. It is the best Pokemon inspired game on mobile (possibly ever?) and highly addicting. The story is engaging and the graphics are beautiful and the nexomon you capture are well drawn and fun to battle with. Amazing game! Hope to see expansions in the future. For only $1 ($.99 cents to be exact) you get so much content. I wouldn't have minded paying $5 honestly (it's just that good)

Not sure why this game has such a low rating. It's not pay to win like other games that have higher ratings. It's monsters are way better designed then other games in its category. And it runs so smoothly. And alot better colouring then other games to. I feel like this is what the pokemon games should aspire to. Maybe hire a few of there artists haha. Although if any of the game Devs are reading this. Maybe put a search function in the database cause everytime I click it I have to scroll all the way down again. Constantly scrolling down lol

Other then the controls being a little Unresponsive at some times. Nexomon has been one of the best of not the best game I have ever played on the mobile phone and even better then some of my pc games and console games. As soon as I payed for the pro version so that I could use it offline (which was from the start) I've loved the it. I highly recommend it. And will recommend it to my friends.

Just finished the game this evening. Overall impression is wonderful. The game play is smooth, and addictive. The controls are just fine. The story line is wonderful; it's very catchy and addicting too. The "Pokemon" aspect that many people seek in games is in this one. You do have the ability catch any monster you encounter, and you do use them to fight your battles. The battle system is set up very well, and it's balanced. The customer service is good, too. I had an issue where I deleted a save file and my diamonds didn't transfer over. The game developer reimbursed me with a smile. I strongly recommend this game to anyone looking for a good turn based rpg game on mobile.

This game is absolutely amazing graphics are fun and well put together the nexomon are creative and awsome!! Side note: I purchased the 5 dollar gem deal and the 1 dollar premium had no issues. When I returned I tried to purchase another 5 dollar gem deal with caused my game to force close and when I returned my second set of gems did not appear yet my card was charged please reimburse my gems please please please and I will continue to play and buy from you . Your game rocks please help fix my issue 5stars all day

Hands down ...this game is awesome- seriously even my kids say it's as good or better than the new Pokemon games .... The graphics are beautiful and the gameplay fun , it's more than I expected and worth paying for. I hope this company comes out with more like this.  Only bad thing is I had to pay for it on each device it was put on üòí

description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:‚Ä¢ Exploration of an ancient civilization‚Ä¢ Crafting and creative building‚Ä¢ Tribal life simulation games‚Ä¢ Exotic materials to mine‚Ä¢ Lots of free craft items to play with‚Ä¢ Amazing blocky graphics‚Ä¢ Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

description: Little Baby Injection Simulator is a surgery doctor game in which little baby is feeling sick that is why kids patients are coming to er emergency hospital with their parents for injection treatment after getting diagnosis of kids disease infection from blood test doctor in er emergency hospital simulator. The er emergency hospital simulator is crowded with kids patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only surgery doctor in this hospital simulation game who is going to treat the little baby. Collect blood sample of little baby, test blood sample and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, little baby can recover quickly. Insert cannula on little baby hand to inject medicine into little baby body quickly. A needle prick of injection may cause slight bleeding from kids patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab. Apply injection simulator to little baby arm or butts and collect blood sample in test tube to test Polio, Hepatitis, pneumonia, Chicken Pox and Measles & other Infection disease. Little Baby Injection Simulator is all about how to inject medicine on butts with injection, drawing blood sample from arm with syringe to test different blood infections & how to apply vaccination injection on little baby as it is always recommended for little baby to get vaccinated to prevent different blood infection or diseases from surgery doctor.Practice your injection skills on sick kids patient in this Little Baby Injection Simulator : Kids test Doctor. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency surgery doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your sick kids patient coming in er emergency ambulance simulator. The poor kids have painful expressions and a fear in baby pretty little eyes. Treat kids with all the doctor instruments and injection simulator at er emergency surgery hospital simulator. At first surgery doctor will rub some numbing cotton over the area of body of kids on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put to get blood sample. From there surgery doctor will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from kids patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Practice er emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in er emergency hospital.

comments: Buggy! Once they fix the signing bugs, this might be a good game. Now, there are widespread examples of users not being able to get in; instead, it freezes at a white screen.  Many videos crash the game, which means you lose the treat you would otherwise earn by watching those ads. Other crashing problems as well.

For not getting even the first event bird out of 3 in alien excavation after opening so many premium eggs reaching (*4) of the premium eggs. I blame - chimera and rovio. Either the makers of the game are idiots or the game is stupid and seriously 2000 per month for an imaginary egg everyday that cannot guarantee a 4 or 5 star bird. Yeah, the makers of the game really are idiots.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Decent game, lots of fun to keep you coming back. I would of rated a 4 star game but every time I need to watch a video the game stops working, stopping me from getting a free premium egg or opening chests!
description: Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We‚Äôre gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before.
